Body:
with open('testdata/models/geocoder_error.json', 'r') as f:
    expectedResponse = f.read()
responses.add(responses.GET,
    'https://geocode.search.hereapi.com/v1/geocode', expectedResponse,
    status=200)
with self.assertRaises(herepy.HEREError):
    self._api.address_with_boundingbox('', [-42.3952, -71.1056], [-42.3312,
        -71.0228])
responses.activate
